title: Filter choice metric type
metric_query: select count({var__column}) as result from {var__trp_table} where {CORE_FILTERS}  and {TRP_FILTERS} and {var__choice} ;
group_by_1_query: select {var__group_by_1}, count({var__column}) as result from {var__trp_table} where {CORE_FILTERS}  and {TRP_FILTERS} and {var__choice} group by {var__group_by_1} order_by {var__order_by};
group_by_2_query: select {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2}, count({var__column}) as result  from {var__trp_table} where {CORE_FILTERS}  and {TRP_FILTERS} and {var__choice} group by {var__group_by_1}, {var__group_by_2} order_by {var__order_by};

choices.label: topic='TSIM Catch up and Planning Meeting'
choices.value: topic='TSIM Catch up and Planning Meeting'
